Name: name
Description: Use this to name your batches for easier identification.

Name: metal_center
Description: Chemical symbol of the desired metal center.

Name: metal_oxidation_state
Description: Oxidation state of the desired metal center.

Name: geometry
Description: The desired denticities of the ligands of the complex.

Name: ligand_db_file
Description: Paths to the ligand database to use for assembling the complexes.

Name: max_num_complexes
Description: Maximum number of complexes to generate.

Name: forcefield
Description: Optional. Whether to relax the generated structures with a force field.

Name: bidentate_rotator
Description: How to assemble bidentate ligands to the complex.

Name: geometry_modifier_filepath
Description: Path to the geometry modifier file.

Name: random_seed
Description: A seed for any random number generator in the assembly process.

Name: complex_name_appendix
Description: Characters to append to the randomly generated complex name.

Name: name: First_batch                 # Name of the batch.
metal_center: Fe                  # Chemical symbol of the desired metal center.
metal_oxidation_state: 2          # Oxidation state of the desired metal center.
total_charge: 0                   # Total charge of the complex.
geometry: 2-1-1                   # Geometry of the complexes. Options: `2-1-1`
ligand_db_file: metalig           # Path to the ligand db file. Options: `metalig`
Description: filepath or list of paths/keywords (see documentation).

Name: max_num_complexes: 100            # Maximum number of complexes/isomers to generate. Integer or `all`.
isomers: all                      # Which isomers to save for each complex. Options: `lowest_energy`
#random_seed: 0                   # Optional. Random seed for reproducibility of results. Choose any integer.
#forcefield: false                # Optional. Whether to optimize the structures after generation with a UFF force field. Recommended: `false`.
#bidentate_rotator: auto          # Optional. How to rotate bidentate ligands in square-planar complexes. Options: `auto`
#geometry_modifier_filepath:      # Optional. Path to a geometry modifier file to shift atoms in complexes.
